questions.question: This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
This arc takes place on a floating island and involves the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a despotic ruler with the power of light. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows for the manipulation of wire. What is...?
This technique, utilized by a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, involves creating an illusion of multiple copies. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
This character, known as 'The Surgeon of Death', is the captain of the Heart Pirates and possesses the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
